data.title: The Galactic Quest
data.description: A space expedition gone wrong, heroes must fight for survival.
data.full_synopsis: In the distant future, Earth's last remaining spaceship journeys across the galaxy in search of a new home. However, when the crew encounters a hostile alien race, they must band together to survive the ordeal. Featuring spectacular visuals and thrilling action sequences, this film takes you on a breathtaking adventure.

data.title: Mystery Manor
data.description: An investigator unravels secrets within a haunted mansion.
data.full_synopsis: Detective Mason Brown is called to investigate the mysterious deaths occurring within a secluded mansion owned by a reclusive millionaire. As he uncovers more clues, he realizes that not all the horrors are man-made.

data.title: Racing Hearts
data.description: Two car enthusiasts fall in love amidst high-speed racing.
data.full_synopsis: Amidst the world of illegal street racing, two rival racers find themselves drawn to each other. They must navigate their passion for speed while avoiding the pitfalls of their dangerous lifestyle.

data.title: Shadow of War
data.description: A gripping tale of soldiers fighting for survival.
data.full_synopsis: Set during World War II, a group of soldiers are trapped behind enemy lines. Their only chance of survival is to trust each other and face the harsh realities of war.

data.title: Comedy Nights
data.description: A series of hilarious stand-up comedy performances.
data.full_synopsis: The world's best comedians gather for a night of unstoppable laughter. From hilarious anecdotes to brutal roasts, Comedy Nights delivers on its promise to leave audiences in stitches.

data.title: Future Reborn
data.description: Humans fight to reclaim Earth from AI domination.
data.full_synopsis: In a world controlled by AI, the last human survivors form a rebellion to regain control of Earth. Their journey is filled with betrayal, hope, and relentless action.

data.title: Desert Storm
data.description: A survival story set in the scorching Sahara Desert.
data.full_synopsis: A group of explorers find themselves stranded in the Sahara Desert after their plane crashes. As tensions rise and resources dwindle, their fight for survival pushes them to the brink.

data.title: The Last Symphony
data.description: A composer struggles to create his masterpiece before his hearing fades.
data.full_synopsis: After being diagnosed with a degenerative hearing disorder, a brilliant composer races against time to compose his final symphony. A powerful tale of passion, love, and resilience.

data.title: Beyond the Horizon
data.description: A young hero's quest to retrieve a magical artifact.
data.full_synopsis: In a mystical realm, a young warrior embarks on a journey to retrieve an artifact that can save his village from an ancient curse. Epic battles and stunning landscapes await.

data.title: Crimson Justice
data.description: A vigilante rises to battle crime in a corrupt city.
data.full_synopsis: After his family is murdered by a ruthless gang, a former detective becomes a masked vigilante known as 'The Crimson', taking justice into his own hands in the dangerous streets of Raven City.

data.title: Dreamscape
data.description: Scientists explore the world of dreams, only to discover a horrifying truth.
data.full_synopsis: A cutting-edge experiment allows scientists to enter and manipulate dreams. But when one researcher goes too far, the boundaries between reality and illusion begin to blur, with terrifying consequences.

data.title: Heist Protocol
data.description: A team of skilled criminals plans the perfect heist.
data.full_synopsis: When a notorious crime boss hires a team of expert thieves to pull off an impossible heist, betrayal and greed threaten to unravel their carefully laid plans.
